plot outline: In a chaotic hamlet lives Bhootayya's grandson Ayyu, who is on the lookout for a bride. There is also a situation of a mistaken death of a moneylender, named Machine Muniyappa. The film follows the comedy of errors that ensues following these two situations.
title: Bhootayyana Mommaga Ayyu
plot: In a chaotic hamlet lives Bhootayya's grandson Ayyu, who is on the lookout for a bride. There is also a situation of a mistaken death of a moneylender, named Machine Muniyappa. The film follows the comedy of errors that ensues following these two situations.::Sunayana Suresh
